column4: I almost wish the system was more swappy: I only have 19 megabytes of main mem free yet a gig of swap is free - y swap is roughly 3 times y memory
I feel like the main mem is being used to store unimportant pages, and it bottlenecks when critical things are trying to run
You can try to increase the swappiness: echo 100 > /proc/sys/vm/swappiness
